item.title: Shelby add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Life is a series of surprises and would not be worth taking or keeping if it were not." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Robert Half
item.description: "No one can be right all the time, but it helps to be right most of the time. " -- Robert Half

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Life is to be enjoyed, not endured" -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "If Life Gets Too Hard To Stand, Kneel." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Work at our responsibility as parents as if everything in life counted on it." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Shelby add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I was gratified to be able to answer promptly, and I did. I said I didnâ€™t know." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Jack Sorenson
item.description: "God gave me my talent and I was afraid of facing him one day if I didn't use it. " -- Jack Sorenson

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Oliver James
item.description: "why are trying so hard to fit in, when you're born to stand out" -- Oliver James

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Terry Brooks
item.description: "Who would you be but who you are?" -- Terry Brooks

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Life is an opportunity, benefit from it. Life is beauty, admire it. Life is a dream, realize it. Life is a challenge, meet it. Life is a duty, complete it. Life is a game, play it. Life is a promise, fulfill it. Life is sorrow, overcome it. Life is a song, sing it. Life is a struggle, accept it. Life is a tragedy, confront it. Life is an adventure, dare it. Life is luck, make it. Life is too precious, do not destroy it. Life is life, fight for it." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Shelby add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Shelby add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "To die would be an awfully big adventure." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Shelby add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer
